summary: This bill, the Expediting Generator Interconnection Procedures Act of 2025, mandates that the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) revise regulations to accelerate the interconnection of electric generation and storage resources to the transmission system. It requires FERC to initiate a rulemaking within 180 days and finalize it within 18 months of the bill's enactment. The bill specifies requirements for transmission providers regarding modeling, cost-effective solutions, information sharing, and timely construction of network upgrades to ensure efficient and reliable interconnection processes.
